battle_traits.name: The Blood Reveals All
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs Hero within the combat range of a friendly empty Cauldron of Blood. Then, pick another unit within the combat range of that Hero to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice. Allocate a number of damage points to the target equal to the roll (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). Then, that Cauldron of Blood becomes full.

battle_traits.name: Skilled Skirmishers
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs Cavalry unit that has not charged this turn and is in combat with an enemy unit that charged this turn to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice. On 3+, the target can immediately use a Retreat ability as if it were your movement phase. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on the target by that Retreat ability.

battle_traits.name: Guided by Morai-Heg
battle_traits.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of combat attacks made by friendly non-Hero Infantry units while they are wholly within 9" of a friendly Krethusa.

battle_traits.name: Laden with Prophecy
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly empty Cauldron of Blood.
battle_traits.effect: If any enemy models were slain this turn by that Cauldron of Blood’s combat attacks, it becomes full.

battle_traits.name: Plumes of Auspicious Smoke
battle_traits.effect:
Effect: Friendly Cauldron of Blood units are either empty or full. They start the battle empty. While a friendly Cauldron of Blood unit is full:

• That Cauldron of Blood has Ward (4+) against damage points inflicted by shooting attacks.
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs units while they are wholly within 9" of that Cauldron of Blood.

heroic_traits.name: Proselyte of Morai-Heg
heroic_traits.effect: Enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: Blade of Prophetic Doom
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+:

• If the target is not damaged, inflict 1 mortal damage on it.
• If the target is damaged, inflict an amount of mortal damage on it equal to the roll.

The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.name: Augury of Battle
The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target has Ward (5+). If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick up to 2 friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs units wholly within 18" of the caster instead of 1.

The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.name: Wings of the Crone Goddess
The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• The target has Fly.
• Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic. If the chanting roll was 8+, add 6" to the target’s Move characteristic instead.

The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.name: Auspicious Strike
The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Croneseer’s Pariahs unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
The Croneseer’s Pariahs Prayer Lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the unmodified hit roll for an attack made against the target is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved. If the chanting roll was 10+, inflict 1 mortal damage for each unmodified hit roll of 1-2 instead.

abilities.name: Dance of Death
abilities.effect: This unit can move 3". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat.

abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Daughters of Khaine Aelf Infantry unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: High Gladiatrix

abilities.name: Paragon of Slaughter
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick a visible friendly Daughters of Khaine Aelf non-Hero Infantry unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Killing Stroke
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Coven Matriarch.

abilities.effect: When this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, if you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance this unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

abilities.name: Burnt Offerings
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is within the combat range of a friendly Cauldron of Blood, pick a visible friendly Daughters of Khaine Aelf non‑Hero Infantry unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target.

Prophecy of Silence: Until the start of your next turn, enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with the target.

Prophecy of Dark Wings: The target can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase. That unit counts as having used a Run ability this turn.

Prophecy of Reclamation: For the rest of the turn, while the target is contesting an objective, subtract 10 from the control scores of enemy units contesting that objective that do not have the Hero or Monster keyword.

abilities.name: Murder of Crows
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll a D6 instead. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. In addition, if the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Shadow Leap
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.
